SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Audio
The Audio class is responsible for handling audio playback.
AudioPlaybackException
Exception thrown when there's an error during audio playback.
Bathroom
Represents a bathroom room in the castle.
Bedroom
Represents a bedroom room in the castle.
Castle
The Castle class represents a collection of rooms in a castle and manages their initialization.
Client
The Client class represents a client that connects to a server socket, sends messages to the server, and receives messages from the server.
ClientConnectionException
The ClientConnectionException is thrown to indicate an error that occurs during client connection.
ClientHandlingException
Exception thrown when there is an error while handling a client in the server.
ClientShutdownException
Exception thrown when there's an error during client shutdown.
Colors
The Colors class provides ANSI escape codes for coloring text output in the console.
CustomServerStartupException
Exception thrown when there is a custom error during server startup.
Game
The Game class serves as the entry point for starting the server and handling startup exceptions.
Gym
Represents a gym room in the castle.
InvalidAnswerException
Exception thrown when the user provides an invalid answer during quiz processing.
Key
Represents a key in the castle, identified by its name.
Kitchen
Represents the Kitchen room in the castle.
Livingroom
Represents the Living Room in the castle.
Loser
The Loser class represents ASCII art depicting the word "LOSER".
Menu
The Menu class provides static methods and constants to generate various menu prompts for the game.
MessageStrings
The MessageStrings class holds static string constants used throughout the application.
Office
Represents the Office in the castle.
PlayerStart
The PlayerStart class serves as the entry point for starting the client application and handling connection exceptions.
Question
The Question class provides an ASCII art representation of the word "QUESTION".
Question
The Question class represents a single question in a quiz.
QuestionLoadException
Exception thrown when there is an error loading questions for a quiz.
QuestionsApp
The QuestionsApp class is responsible for handling quiz questions from a JSON file, presenting them to a user, and validating user responses.
Quiz
The Quiz class represents a collection of subjects, where each subject is associated with a list of questions.
QuizProcessingException
Exception thrown when there is an error during quiz processing.
Room
Abstract class representing a room in the castle.
RoomEnum
The RoomEnum enum represents various rooms, each associated with a specific key and room type.
RoomType
Enum representing different types of rooms in the castle.
Server
The Server class handles client connections, game initialization, and game interactions.
ServerInterruptedException
Exception thrown when a server thread is interrupted unexpectedly.
ServerStartupException
Exception thrown when there is an error during server startup.
SpookyCastle
The SpookyCastle class provides an ASCII art representation of a spooky castle.
Winner
The Winner class provides an ASCII art representation of a winner message.
